general_info.summary: This text appears to be a sitemap or navigation structure for Galgotias University, covering various aspects of the institution. It details international student services, campus life, student support, academic schools, administrative functions, and important university initiatives and publications. The content highlights admissions, courses, student activities, grievance redressal, and the university's vision and achievements.

university_rankings.summary: The text highlights that the institution is ranked among the top private universities in India (15th) and amongst all universities, both private and government, in India (43rd), according to the QS World University Rankings 2026. It also includes a call to action to "Enquire Now."
